titles.title: A bill to approve the transfer of Yellow Creek Port properties in Iuka, Mississippi.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 2/4/2013--Introduced. Approves the conveyance by the Tennessee Valley Authority (TVA) to the state of Mississippi of the federally-owned Yellow Creek Port properties in the custody of the TVA at Iuka, Mississippi.
